And thanks to the latest Gallium Nitride (GaN) technology, this gan charger is not only powerful but also compact, making it the perfect companion for all your charging needs. Say goodbye to slow charging and hello to convenience with our usb fast charger.     [Safety USB C Charging station]Our NanoPulse Monitoring detects current variations in mere nanoseconds, ensuring immediate response to any potential issues, safeguarding both the fast charger station and your devices.This ensures maximum charging safety by providing protection against over-current, over-voltage, short-circuit, and overheating. Your devices are safeguarded at all times, allowing you to charge with peace of mind.     [Universal Compatibility]The usb c charger block supports a broad range of charging protocols (PPS, PD3.0, QC4+, and more). Seamlessly powers over 1,000 devices from smartphones to laptops, ensuring you'll always have the right charge.     [Perfect for Travel] With its compact and portable design, this charging station doubles as a travel charger for multiple devices is ideal for on-the-go use, road trips, and family outings. It ensures you have ample ports for all your devices.Say goodbye to carrying multiple chargers,our multiple charger station ensures you have ample ports for all your devices.Don't let limited outlets slow you down – choose our Travel-Friendly usb charger station and stay powered up wherever you go.     [Package Inclusions] Along with the usb charging hub (with 8 ports), you'll receive a user guide, an unmatched 24-month protection, and lifelong technical support.

description: 【𝐑𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐆𝐨𝐥𝐝 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞: 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝟏𝟔-𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐡 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐤 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲】Discover the ideal balance of style and practicality with our 16-inch notebook, featuring a sleek rose gold exterior. With its compact dimensions of 36.8 x 24.8 x 2.2 cm and a lightweight design at just 1.65 kg, this notebook is perfect for professionals who need to stay productive on the move. The rose gold finish adds a touch of sophistication, making it not just a tool but a statement piece. Whether you're working from a coffee shop or traveling between meetings, this notebook combines elegant design with the performance you need to excel.     【𝐂𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐩 𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐢𝐧 𝐂𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐮𝐫: 𝟏𝟔-𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐡 𝐅𝐇𝐃 𝐁𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐬!】Experience the immersive power of a 16-inch display with an impressive 90% screen-to-body ratio and ultra-thin 5mm bezels, providing a spacious viewing area for gaming, video editing, and movie marathons. Enjoy sharp, detailed visuals with Full High Definition (FHD) IPS resolution of 1920x1200 pixels, featuring vibrant colors and rich contrasts. The screen's 180° hinge allows for flexible viewing angles, so you can easily share content or adjust your view for the best experience, whether you’re watching a movie or working on a project.     【𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐔𝐩 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞: 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥 𝐂𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐫𝐨𝐧 𝐍𝟓𝟏𝟎𝟓 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐨𝐫】Meet the IN tel Celeron N5105 processor—an absolute beast clocking 2.0GHz to turbocharged 2.9GHz! This processor is designed to handle your everyday tasks efficiently. Enjoy smoother gaming with decent graphics and responsive gameplay, making it a solid choice for casual gamers. Whether you're editing videos or working on creative projects, the N5105 provides the power needed for a reliable performance. Multitask with ease, whether you’re managing spreadsheets, documents, or multiple applications at once—this processor helps you stay productive throughout the day.     【𝐔𝐧𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐡 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞: 𝟏𝟔𝐆𝐁 𝐑𝐀𝐌 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞】Supercharge your laptop with 16GB DDR4 RAM—designed for smooth multitasking across various applications. Whether for work, school, or home, this laptop delivers reliable performance. Choose from 256GB, 512GB, or 1TB SSD options to store your documents, media, and essential data. Need more space? Expand up to 1TB with an additional SSD for added flexibility. Ideal for business, school, and home use, this laptop is built to adapt to your everyday needs.     【𝐔𝐧𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐮𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧】 Backlit Bliss: Illuminate your workspace with a backlit full-size numeric keyboard—navigate effortlessly in the dark. Touchpad Magic: Glide through tasks with a spacious touchpad—a responsive digital canvas for seamless interactions.Fingerprint Fort Knox: Elevate privacy! Safeguard your info with a fingertip. Built-in fingerprint support ensures exclusive access. Multi-Port Extravaganza: Connect like never before! USB3.0*2, USB2.0, mini HDMI—your multi-port maestro for office, gaming, and more. Wireless Wonder: Experience freedom with 2.4G/5G WiFi and Bluetooth 5.0.     【𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐲 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 𝐖𝐢𝐧 𝟏𝟏 𝐏𝐫𝐨 & 𝐌𝐒 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝟐𝟎𝟏𝟗 𝐏𝐫𝐞-𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐝】Experience the latest Win 11 Professional Edition, designed to provide a safer, faster, and more responsive computing experience. The pre-installed and permanently activated MS Office 2019 (including Word, Excel, PPT, and more) ensures that your productivity tools are ready to use from the moment you power up. Streamline your workflow with no additional setup required—just start working on your projects, documents, and presentations right away. Enjoy enhanced performance and seamless integration with the latest software at your fingertips.

Immersive Full HD Display: Experience stunning visuals on the 14.1-inch FHD IPS display with a 1920x1080 resolution. The 0.2-inch micro bezel and an impressive 85% screen-to-body ratio guarantee an immersive and visually captivating viewing experience.     Ultra-Portable Design: Weighing only 3 pounds and with a sleek 0.8-inch thickness, this laptop is designed for life on the go. Enjoy unparalleled mobility without sacrificing screen size or performance, allowing you to carry your world wherever you venture.     Enhanced Windows 11 Pro Experience: Harness the latest in operating system technology with Windows 11 Pro. Experience enhanced speed, security, and efficiency, streamlining your tasks and empowering you to achieve more in less time.     Peace of Mind Warranty: Enjoy worry-free usage with a 1-year warranty and round-the-clock customer service. We're dedicated to providing continuous support, ensuring your experience with FUNYET is smooth and reliable.

details.detail_item: Unmatched Performance: Powered by an 11th generation Celeron N5095 processor with 4 cores and 4 threads, this laptop ensures seamless operations at speeds of up to 2.9 GHz, delivering an unmatched level of performance, whether for work or play.
